name: cognosco
description: A website where you learn a huge range of things. More content added every day

scripts.min: npm run-script min:js && npm run-script min:css
scripts.copy: npm run-script copy:html && npm run-script copy:htaccess && npm run-script copy:img && npm run-script copy:fonts
scripts.htmlincludes: html-includes --src ./ --dest build/ --minify && rimraf build/node_modules && rimraf build/build
scripts.build:keep: npm run-script ts && npm run-script scss && npm run-script cssprefix && npm run-script min && npm run-script copy:htaccess && npm run-script copy:img && npm run-script copy:fonts && npm run-script htmlincludes
scripts.build: npm run-script build:keep && rimraf build/js/bundle.js && rimraf build/css/bundle.css
scripts.build:dev: npm run-script ts && npm run-script scss && npm run-script htmlincludes

browserslist: > 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead, ie 8-11
